This cycle should: (1) Create a test harness that injects controlled drift into a continuation_prompt and triggers an actual cycle transition via af_engine.py, (2) Verify rde_healing_applied appears in state/mission.json with correct cycle number and healing_prompt_length after the transition completes, (3) Query /api/glassbox/missions/<mission_id>/healing-events and confirm it returns non-empty healing_events array, (4) Capture Firefox screenshot showing populated healing data in the API response, (5) Generate final comparison matrix showing simulated tests vs controlled live healing vs organic live execution.
